metadata.notes: Ranges are indicative; use as peer benchmarks, not strict norms.

professional_services.description: Implementation, onboarding, consulting, delivery. Excludes R&D and G&A.
professional_services.span_of_control: Delivery managers: 6–10 FTE per manager; practice leads: 15–25 FTE.
red_flags: PS headcount > 10 FTE per $100M revenue without clear high-touch model
More than 15% in pure overhead (non-billable leadership)

customer_success.description: Adoption, renewals, expansion, health scores, touchpoints.
red_flags: CSM count > 6 FTE per $100M revenue without enterprise-heavy segment
Support FTE > 8 per $100M revenue without high-volume SMB or consumer mix
Tier-1 share < 40% (possible over-escalation or under-investment in deflection)
Very low tickets per agent (< 50) without clear complexity justification
